contentrichtext.text: '''Scott Walker''' may refer to: *[[Scott Walker (politician)]] (born 1967), Governor of Wisconsin and former county executive of Milwaukee County, Wisconsin *[[Scott Walker (boxer)]] (1969â€“2004), boxer *[[Scott Walker (footballer)]] (born 1990), Northern Irish footballer, plays for Livingston F.C. *[[Scott Walker (ice hockey)]] (born 1973), professional ice hockey player and head coach of the Guelph Storm *[[Scott Walker (singer)]] (born 1943 as Noel Scott Engel), solo singer and member of The Walker Brothers **''[[Scott Walker: 30 Century Man]]'', a documentary about the singer *Scott Walker, convicted of murdering [[Murder of Jody Dobrowski|Jody Dobrowski]] in South London in 2005 ==Other uses== *[[Scott Tallon Walker]], an Irish architecture firm founded by Michael Scott, Ronnie Tallon and Robin Walker {{hndis|name=Walker, Scott}}
